verses.text: Return, Israel, \w to|strong="H2719"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \nd Lord\nd* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* God, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* stumbled \w in|strong="H5307"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* iniquity.

\w Take|strong="H7725"\w* words \w of|strong="H3068"\w* repentance \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*. \w Say|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w him|strong="H7725"\w*: Wholly pardon \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*, accept \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* good, \w instead|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* sacrificing bulls, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* offer \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w praise|strong="H3588"\w*.

Assyria \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H7725"\w* save \w us|strong="H7725"\w*, \w nor|strong="H2896"\w* Egyptian warhorses, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3605"\w* \w more|strong="H7725"\w* \w call|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w work|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* hands \w our|strong="H3068"\w* gods. \w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* orphan Israel finds \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w*.

“\w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* heal \w their|strong="H5921"\w* apostasy, \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w love|strong="H7355"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* freely, \w now|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3027"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* anger \w is|strong="H3027"\w* turned \w away|strong="H5750"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*,

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H7725"\w* \w be|strong="H7725"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* dew \w to|strong="H7725"\w* Israel. \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H7725"\w* blossom \w like|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* lily, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H7725"\w* plant \w his|strong="H7725"\w* roots \w like|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* cedars \w of|strong="H4480"\w* Lebanon,

\w his|strong="H5221"\w* saplings \w will|strong="H1961"\w* spread \w out|strong="H6524"\w*, \w his|strong="H5221"\w* beauty \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H3478"\w* \w of|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* olive tree, \w his|strong="H5221"\w* fragrance \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* cedars \w of|strong="H5221"\w* \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*.

People \w will|strong="H1961"\w* return \w and|strong="H3212"\w* dwell \w in|strong="H3212"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* shade, they \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w bring|strong="H3212"\w* life \w to|strong="H3212"\w* new grain. They \w will|strong="H1961"\w* sprout \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* vine, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w their|strong="H1961"\w* renown \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H7381"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* wine \w of|strong="H7381"\w* \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*.

Ephraim – what \w have|strong="H1612"\w* \w I|strong="H6738"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w do|strong="H1612"\w* \w with|strong="H3427"\w* idols! \w It|strong="H7725"\w* \w is|strong="H1715"\w* \w I|strong="H6738"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \nd Lord\nd* \w who|strong="H3427"\w* \w respond|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w him|strong="H7725"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* look after \w him|strong="H7725"\w*. \w I|strong="H6738"\w* am \w like|strong="H7725"\w* \w an|strong="H2421"\w* evergreen cypress, \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w* \w is|strong="H1715"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* fruit found.

Whoever \w is|strong="H4100"\w* wise, let \w him|strong="H4672"\w* discern these things, prudent, let \w him|strong="H4672"\w* \w perceive|strong="H7789"\w* \w them|strong="H4672"\w*; \w For|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \nd Lord\nd*’s ways \w are|strong="H4100"\w* straight, \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* righteous walk \w in|strong="H4672"\w* \w them|strong="H4672"\w*, \w but|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* wicked stumble \w in|strong="H4672"\w* \w them|strong="H4672"\w*.
